author: abehazbunjr
title: Tokenized Scripting as a Service
description: Creators face a high tech barrier to adding utility to native tokens, and much code is reinvented by the projects who can.
solution: Naptcha, a B2B service that maps native tokens to on-page and server-side actions that can be combined into unique business models.
experience: I am a full-time Plutus student with two years of Cardano experience and 14 years of web analytics and managing large technical projects.
